movies._Movie__title: Star Wars: Episode Iv - A New Hope
movies._Movie__summary: Luke Skywalker joins forces with Princess Leia and Han Solo to battle the evil Empire, and try to stop them from building a massive space station capable of destroying entire planets.

movies._Movie__title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
movies._Movie__summary: The Rebel Alliance is on the run as the Empire strikes back. Luke seeks guidance from Jedi Master Yoda while his friends are pursued by Darth Vader.

movies._Movie__title: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace
movies._Movie__summary: The Galactic Republic is threatened by the Trade Federation, and two Jedi Knights discover a young Anakin Skywalker who has the potential to become a powerful Jedi.

movies._Movie__title: Star Wars: Episode Vi - Return Of The Jedi
movies._Movie__summary: Luke Skywalker confronts his father, Darth Vader, and the Emperor to try to turn him back to the light side of the Force, while the Rebel Alliance launches an assault on the second Death Star.

movies._Movie__title: Star Wars: Episode Ii - Attack Of The Clones
movies._Movie__summary: Anakin Skywalker becomes a Jedi apprentice, and he and PadmÃ© Amidala confront a separatist movement that threatens the galaxy.

movies._Movie__title: Star Wars: Episode Iii - Revenge Of The Sith
movies._Movie__summary: The Republic becomes the Galactic Empire, and Anakin Skywalker turns to the dark side, becoming Darth Vader, while the Jedi are nearly wiped out.

movies._Movie__title: Star Wars: Episode Vii - The Force Awakens
movies._Movie__summary: Three decades after the defeat of the Empire, a new threat arises in the form of the First Order, and a new generation of heroes must confront it.

movies._Movie__title: Star Wars: Episode Viii - The Last Jedi
movies._Movie__summary: Rey seeks guidance from Luke Skywalker, while the Resistance faces the First Order. Kylo Ren struggles with his own path.

movies._Movie__title: Star Wars: Episode Ix - The Rise Of Skywalker
movies._Movie__summary: The Resistance battles the First Order once more as Rey, Finn, and Poe Dameron continue their journey to discover the truth about the Skywalker legacy.
